title: Translanguaging Pedagogy Design for Multilingual Classrooms: Reverse Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Project-based learning leveraging interaction between learners’ native language and target language in a CMI (Chinese-as-a-medium-of-instruction) context.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain over 10 Chinese character vocabulary items contextually using translanguaging strategies
Learners can complete at least two real-world connected projects (e.g., cultural comparison presentations) applying a backward design model
Learners can resolve communication barriers in multilingual environments using three or more translanguaging techniques
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
